name: paunchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a man) having a fat stomach: He is tall and a bit paunchy. She encourages even slightly paunchy patients to lose weight. See
paunch
More examplesFewer examplesHe is growing older and getting paunchy.Today, at 58, he is paunchyHe was middle-aged, balding, and paunchy.
